Hi,

I'd like to return a single URL in an HTTP response. Something like:

=
-----------------
200 OK

http://example.com/12345
-----------------

I'm w=
ondering about the media type to use here.

I've seen some use of "text/url=
" but it isn't actually registered in the IANA MIME media types registry.

=
Using text/plain? 
Using another representation for the URL?

Basically, I'=
m curious about how other people on the group would approach this (and why)=
.

Philippe
